description.narrative: This activity (Governance and Transparency Fund) is a component of Governance and Transparency Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Not for profit organisation' and a budget of £131,036,768. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Anti-corruption organisations and institutions, Democratic participation and civil society, Media and free flow of information. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, KPMG LLP. The start date is 29-06-2007 and the end date is 01-03-2014.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Media and free flow of information
Public sector policy and administrative management

description.narrative: Executive - General Public Service - Executive - executive
Justice, Law and Order - Justice, Law, Order and Security - Justice, Law and Order - prisons
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - other general services
Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
